Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer

Class GameRefresher

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.GameRefresher
public class GameRefresher extends Object
The helper of the GameController to facilitate the rendering process of the game.
This realizes the FACADE Design Pattern as it provides a simple intro for the caller while in charge of the complicated tasks of decorating the rendered component.
Author:
fy916

    • runningPrep

      public void runningPrep() throws IOException
      The running prepation for the game rendering, start the game in the world and then load the stylesheet for the UIs.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • run

      public void run​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc) throws IOException
      Running process, this will be repeated everytime the frame refreshes
      Parameters:
      gc - The GraphicsContext Object that provides the ability to draw on the canvas
      Throws:
      IOException - Since the elements will continous refresh and the rendering images may be read along the process, may throw IOException

    • statusChecker

      public void statusChecker() throws IOException
      Check the game status like if the game is losing or winning, if so the function will access the Timeline and then stop the frame from playing
      Throws:
      IOException

    • updateUI

      public void updateUI()
      Update the UI of the game like score counts, backgrounds, lives, etc.

    • keyBindings

      public void keyBindings​(javafx.scene.Scene input_scene)
      Binds the keys with the controller
      Parameters:
      input_scene - The scene of the game, which gets the user keyinput
